monq.jfa

Class SimpleFormatters

  • java.lang.Object
    • monq.jfa.SimpleFormatters

  • public class SimpleFormatters
extends java.lang.Object

    This class is merely a container to wrap some very simple Formatters into one source file. The class itself cannot be instantiated. Please note that you want to use the subclasses normally only indirectly by means of a PrintfFormatter.

    Author:
    © 2004 Harald Kirsch

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SimpleFormatters.FixedString
      implements a Formatter which totally ignores the given TextStore and instead appends a predefined string to the destination buffer.
      static class  SimpleFormatters.GetVar
      implements a Formatter the format method of which inserts an element from a Map into the output.
      static class  SimpleFormatters.Part
      implements a Formatter the format method of which produces a substring of part of the given TextStore.
      static class  SimpleFormatters.PartLen
      implements a Formatter the format method of which produces the length of a given part of the given TextStore.
      static class  SimpleFormatters.PartSeq
      implements a Formatter the format method of which concatenates several parts of the given TextStore.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Formatter NumParts
      this Formatter will append the number of parts of the TextStore passed in.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • NumParts

        public static final Formatter NumParts
        this Formatter will append the number of parts of the TextStore passed in.
